CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
CurrentVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
OldVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
CurrentVersion.description: The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
OldVersion.description: ,The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance.Â Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
CurrentVersion.description:
,Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data loss prevention - Updated admin experience for settings
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving the admin experience to manage Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention settings including the endpoint settings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data loss prevention - Updated admin experience for settings
OldVersion.description: We are improving the admin experience to manage Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention settings including the endpoint settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 4 new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MailItemsAccessed; 2. Send; 3. SearchQueryInitiatedExchange; 4. SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint; The following logs will differ based upon the userâs license. This following additional metadata is added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: Premium Insight 1: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
OldVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
OldVersion.description:
,The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to
manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Browsed to generative AI websites indicator
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, we are adding a new indicator, âbrowsed to generative AI sites,â for the risky browser usage policy template, giving visibility into organizational usage of generative AI domains. User information is pseudonymized by default with strong privacy controls in place to protect end user trust. While visiting one of these AI domains may be authorized by an organization, this indicator is designed to help ensure they are correctly accounting for whether and how, these sites may be accessed in policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
OldVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
OldVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
OldVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support
OldVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
OldVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component. Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file to meet the requirements of the case.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New search UI for contacts and global address list
CurrentVersion.description: A new in-flow experience for searching contacts and the global address list while addressing mail and calendar events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a town hall are now accessible within the town hall setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
CurrentVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).
